籤詩版本二:
Qin Jun anotsungirira hupenyu hwekuchengetedza uye akatsunga kusaita zvakaipa.
Kusvikira mumwe munhu ashandisa simba zvinyoronyoro, matavi akafa nemiti yakare ichagadzirazve maruva.
詩意:
Iyi hexagram yakafanana nematanda akafa ari kukura maruva.
Chinhu chose chine kubudirira kwacho.
解曰: Iva anochengetedza uye akanyarara. Zvinhu zvinoitika. Kana ikafamba, kuchava nenjodzi dzakawanda. Hapana mhosva mukunyarara.
籤詩故事一:
◇Kuredza kweWeishui
MuZhou Dynasty, Jiang Shang, anonzi Ziya, akaberekerwa muJi (chizvarwa cheXuzhou, East China Sea), uye zita rake rechiTao raiva Fei Xiong. Tateguru akapihwa zita rekuti Zai Lu (zita renzvimbo), saka akanziwo Lu Wang.
Kuti atize nguva dzinonetsa dzaMambo Zhou weShang Dynasty, Jiang Ziya aigara pedyo nemvura yeEast China Sea uye airedza muRwizi rweWeishui.
Chiredzo chakatwasuka.Chokwadi, moyo wake hausi kuredza, asi shuviro yake ndeyekuva mutungamiriri wehurumende.
Mambo Wen akanzwa kuti akanga akachenjera ndokumupinza basa somudzidzisi wake (mutungamiri wehurumende). (Jiang Ziya aive nemakore makumi masere panguva iyoyo)
Gare gare, Mambo Wu weZhou akarwisa Mambo Zhou weShang, akaparadza Shang Dynasty, uye akatanga Zhou Dynasty. Mambo Wu akadana Jiang Ziya Shangfu. Mwanakomana waFeng Jiang, Ding Gong, akazova Marquis weQi.
(Nyaya iyi idimikira: mirira mukana, mirira kusvika pave nemukana unotanga, ipapo budiriro ichatanga.)
聖意: Muve nerombo rakanaka kumhuri,mumba,neupfumi.Kana nguva yasvika kutengeserana kunenge kwabudirira.Kana musikana azvarirwa kuLiujia,vanofamba netsoka vanovharira minda,makonye esirika.Zvipfuyo zvitanhatu zvichanetsa kuwana.Zvakanaka rombo rakanaka mumatare edzimhosva, kutama, kuchengetedza, kurasikirwa nepfuma, kurwara, uye rombo rakanaka.Makomo nemakuva.
